                     ef2Weight my2dWeight( {ELE_0}pT, {ELE_0}Eta ) : 0.5139 +-    0.0519 evt: 47.67135091
                                               [Histo] E0 pt (GeV) :      1 +-         0 evt: 47.67135091
                                applyHM( myWeight( {ELE}pT ) == 1) : 0.7389 +-    0.0636 evt: 35.22570317
                                                   Size (ELE) >= 2 : 0.5615 +-    0.0836 evt: 19.77883789
					 --> Overall efficiency	 =   1.98 % +-   0.44 %
Bins for analysis : BP_1
saving...	saved.
finished.
